Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored a goal, assisted by L. Paqueta at 30'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The over/under was 2.5 and the teams scored 1 goals, so people who bet the under won.
Brazil won at -287 odds so a bet of $287 won $387 total.
Others: Estadio Couto Pereira, Curitiba, BRA was the venue of the match.
